summary:
Neptune is the eighth planet from the Sun and the fourth largest. It's a giant, icy planet, 17 times heavier than Earth! It's so far away that it takes 164.8 years to orbit the Sun. 

Scientists found Neptune using math, predicting its position from changes in Uranus's orbit. It was first seen with a telescope in 1846.

Neptune has a blue color, high-speed winds, and active weather. It also has a few rings and several moons, with Triton being the largest.
title: Neptune
